attributes.action: not alow MP's to use parliamentary privilege to contest expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parliamentary privilege stops MP's from civil actions when they raise issues of confidence in the house of commons, or lords. It should not be allowed to be used to allow MP's from making fraudulent expenses claims and not be charged or questioned on there legality .

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
